explanation: Given the harsh and arid conditions of the Atacama Desert, the versatility of the 2 litres of 180 proof liquor makes it the most important remaining item for our survival. It can be used for multiple essential functions such as disinfecting wounds, starting fires for signaling and cooking, and even potentially being diluted to create a safer liquid for emergencies. Having such a multifunctional item significantly increases our chances of enduring and signaling for rescue in this extreme environment.
